name: NOIR Smooth Shine Serum

name: Fortuna Hair Oil
description: Fortified with essential oils, this hair oil deeply hydrates your scalp and strengthens hair from root to tip.

description: A long-lasting hair spray that provides strong hold without stiffness, keeping your hairstyle intact all day.

name: Ipsum Hair Cream
description: A deeply nourishing hair cream that restores hydration, controls frizz, and enhances shine for a healthy look.

name: Fortuna Hair Mask
description: A luxurious hair mask that repairs damaged hair, restoring its strength, softness, and elasticity.

name: Nova Nourishing Oil
description: A nourishing oil rich in vitamins and natural extracts, helping to improve scalp health and promote hair growth.

name: Bio Glow Hair Serum
description: A lightweight serum that tames frizz, enhances shine, and provides a silky finish for all hair types.

name: Pure Essence Hair Conditioner
description: A moisture-rich conditioner that detangles, softens, and strengthens your hair while preventing breakage.

name: HydraBoost Hair Lotion
description: An ultra-hydrating lotion that replenishes moisture and protects hair from dryness and damage.

name: Zenith Hair Gel
description: A strong-hold hair gel designed to shape, sculpt, and keep your hairstyle in place without residue.

name: Luxury Hair Treatment
description: A premium hair treatment formulated to repair, rejuvenate, and deeply condition dry and damaged hair.

name: Glow Hair Elixir
description: A luxurious elixir that boosts shine, restores health, and protects hair from heat and environmental damage.

name: Clear Hair Solution
description: A clarifying hair solution that removes buildup and excess oil, leaving hair fresh and weightless.

description: A powerful hair booster that strengthens roots, reduces hair fall, and promotes thicker hair growth.

name: Vibrant Hair Oil
description: A revitalizing hair oil that deeply conditions and enhances natural shine for silky, smooth hair.

description: A lightweight hair serum enriched with plant-based ingredients to nourish and revitalize hair.

name: Pure Hair Treatment
description: An intensive hair treatment that restores vitality, prevents breakage, and deeply hydrates strands.
